bibl.title: with the assistance of Richard W.V. CATLING and the collaboration of many scholars, A Lexicon of Greek Personal Names. Volume IIIB. Central Greece, from the Megarid to Thessaly.
bibl.seg: FRASER Peter Marshall and Elaine MATTHEWS (Edd.), with the assistance of Richard W.V. CATLING and the collaboration of many scholars, A Lexicon of Greek Personal Names. Volume IIIB. Central Greece, from the Megarid to Thessaly.
Oxford, Clarendon Press, 2000, 4°, xxii-478 pp. ISBN 0-19-815293-0. £80.
C.R. par Alain Martin, AntCl 71 (2002) pp. 387-389 [concerne aussi: Simon HORNBLOWER and Elaine MATTHEWS (Edd.), Greek Personal Names. Their Value as Evidence (Oxford, 2000)].
